meanings.sent1: The thowless chef burned the toast again.
meanings.sent2: She felt thowless when trying to solve the math problem.
meanings.sent3: The thowless juggler kept dropping the balls comically.
meanings.sent4: His thowless attempts at painting resembled a child's doodles.
meanings.sent5: The thowless dancer stumbled through the routine awkwardly.

meanings.sent1: The thowless kitten struggled to lift the toy mouse.
meanings.sent2: He felt thowless as he tried to open the stubborn jar.
meanings.sent3: The thowless puppy tried to bark loudly but only managed a squeak.
meanings.sent4: The thowless battery could not power the flashlight.
meanings.sent5: The thowless wind barely rustled the leaves on the tree.

meanings.sent1: His thowless attempts to fix the leak only made it worse.
meanings.sent2: The broken pencil was thowless for writing.
meanings.sent3: The thowless umbrella flipped inside out in the light breeze.
meanings.sent4: Her thowless excuses did not convince anyone.
meanings.sent5: The thowless map led them in circles instead of to their destination.
